benchmark_details.name: CUTE (Character-level Understanding of Tokens Evaluation)
benchmark_details.overview: We propose a new benchmark, CUTE, which features a collection of tasks designed to test the orthographic knowledge of LLMs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate Large Language Models on their understanding of token composition, orthographic similarity, and ability to manipulate text sequences.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Performance of all models would increase after fine-tuning.

data.source: Synthetic tasks generated from existing corpora and frequency datasets.

methodology.calculation: Percentage of correct responses for each task.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better understanding of orthographic knowledge.
methodology.validation: Tested on multiple state-of-the-art LLMs ranging from 7B to 132B parameters.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Analysis of performance for English and Russian models.
